properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:59PM AKST until January 23 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Juneau area, greatest amounts in the Mendenhall Valley.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 1 PM AKST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions will impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to mix with rain Thursday
afternoon, and change to rain for Downtown Juneau.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 1 PM AKST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 2 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON
